title: Why are there 6 stoplights at the intersection of 17th St. and College Road when there are only 5 lanes of traffic---2 left turn lanes, 2 right turn lanes and 1 through lane across College Road to Waltmoor (two lights for this lane)???
text:
Here's a link to the answer to your question.
